attributes.action: An additional Public Holiday on June 25th to have an Australian style Christmas
attributes.additional_details: We will be able to gather outdoors and celebrate Christmas on a hot day like Australia does
attributes.background: As we cannot gather on Christmas Day, give the UK an additional Public Holiday on June 25th, half way between Christmases

rejection.details: Make June 25th. 2021 an "Australian Christmas" bank holiday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554630
